TopicTitle: Mobile Lab ate my favorite Kerbals?

Articles.Content:
Okay, so I'm pretending to be at work so can't play around with it, but I loaded up the .23 last night and played late. I was tired and so maybe I'm just missing something obvious. I orbited the MobileLab and EVA'd two kerbinauts into it, did some laboratory work and I couldn't figure out how to get them outta there. It's like it ate them, their little pictures don't show on the ship, right clicking the kerbal eater gave me nothing. I think this is a ploy to feed Kerbals to some psyhco machine. I had to get to sleep, so left it at that and went to bed. This ship wouldn't survive re-enty with that mammoth attached, so am I doing something wrong? Hep me please! Jensen and Sigbal are like my children.

13
They are in there, left click the hatch to get them out

I haven't messed with the lab yet.

Been in career mode.

Put I would say the labs using old hitch hiker

Logic.

Like sal said right click on the labs hatch and you should be given the option to Eva.

They are in there, left click the hatch to get them out

Thanks, I thought I tried that, but I'll give it a go when I get home.
